title: Blended Elementary Language Education Design: Comparative Analysis of Computer vs. Face-to-Face Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of foundational language education theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening blended learning design competencies in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Compare and analyze the educational characteristics of computer-based and face-to-face learning.
Design effective blended learning strategies in limited technological environments.
Develop a lesson plan integrating online and offline activities within a language education context.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
